attributes.action: Implement an Animal Bill of Rights protecting all species of animals
attributes.background: It is currently legal to own, slaughter, test on, eat and wear animals. All animals deserve the basic rights to their lives and to not be treated as objects. We are asking for a law enshrining rights for non-human animals.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
